amendment.description: Amendment to the Gilman en bloc amendment (A017) requires the President to unilaterally lift the arms embargo against Bosnia upon the request of the Bosnian government.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to the Gilman amendment, consisting of the text of the amendment printed in the Congressional Record as amendment No. 45 on May 23, declaring that the U.S. supports the efforts of the Government of the Republic of Bosnia and Herzegovina to defend itself against aggression, and directing the President to lift the arms embargo against the Bosnian government.

action.text: Amendment (A018) offered by Mr. Hoyer to the Gilman amendment (A017).
On agreeing to the Hoyer amendment (A018) Agreed to by recorded vote: 318 - 99 (Roll No. 362).
